ShapelyChipDesigns.allparts module¶

class ShapelyChipDesigns.allparts.ListTable¶

Bases: list

Overridden list class which takes a 2-dimensional list of the form [[1,2,3],[4,5,6]], and renders an HTML Table in IPython Notebook.

Methods

count(...)

pop(...) Raises IndexError if list is empty or index is out of range.

reverse L.reverse() – reverse IN PLACE

join_parts(name1, name2, anker12)¶
